wikipedia_page.main: Squadron Leader Geoffrey Maurice Rothwell DFC and Bar (3 April 1920 – 5 November 2017) was a Royal Air Force bomber pilot during the Second World War who flew more than 70 missions over occupied Europe including dropping secret agents at their rendezvous.

response: * 5 November – Geoff Rothwell, World War II bomber pilot (born 1920)
*Geoff Rothwell, 97, British Royal Air Force bomber pilot of the Second World War.Geoff Rothwell
